short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly integrate speech-to-text transcriptions on ChatGPT and anywhere on the web. Powered by OpenAI's Whisper API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with Whispering, a lightweight open-source extension that provides speech-to-text transcription anywhere on the web—powered by OpenAI's Whisper API. 🗣️

🔑 Key Features:

- 🎙️ Integration with ChatGPT: Add a convenient recording button to transcribe your voice directly within the chat.
- 🌍 Record and transcribe across any website: With the global keyboard shortcut feature (default "Control+Shift+x" or "Command+Shift+x"), Whispering empowers you to use voice input effortlessly on any webpage.
- 🔒 Privacy and security measures: Whispering is free and open source. You can view the source code on GitHub for transparency, and can even download and compile a version on your own machine.

Whispering enables you to use OpenAI's Whisper API in your daily workflow. Give your productivity a boost 🚀, thank you for using Whispering, and happy writing!
